followMeBar

Multiple Sticky Titles with CSS and JS

On some mobile platforms there are lists that group items under multiple headings. As you scroll through the list, the current title or heading follows you until you reach the next one at which point the current one is pushed up and the new title or heading docks to the top.
This snippet emulates this functionality.

I created this originally because of this question on stack overflow.
